Introducing White Sands: Dual-Action Body Scrub, the ultimate solution for your skincare concerns. Our unique formula combines the power of pure quartz crystals for physical exfoliation with natural alpha hydroxy acids derived from kiwi fruit for chemical exfoliation. This dual-action approach provides the ultimate solution for common body skincare concerns, such as Keratosis pilaris (aka strawberry skin) and ingrown hairs.

Keratosis pilaris, also known as strawberry skin, is a common condition that results in rough, bumpy skin on the arms, legs, and buttocks. White Sands: Dual-Action Body Scrub uses pure quartz crystals to physically exfoliate the skin, effectively removing dead skin cells and improving the texture and appearance of the skin. In addition, our formula contains natural alpha hydroxy acids derived from kiwi fruit to chemically exfoliate the skin and help prevent the build-up of dead skin cells that can cause Keratosis pilaris.

But that's not all! White Sands: Dual-Action Body Scrub also helps to prevent ingrown hairs by exfoliating the skin, removing dead skin cells and other impurities that can clog pores and cause ingrown hairs. In addition, the physical exfoliation provided by the pure quartz crystals helps to break up any existing ingrown hairs and promote healthy hair growth.

White Sands: Dual-Action Body Scrub is gentle enough for daily use and suitable for all skin types. With regular use, you will experience smoother, softer, and more radiant skin. Plus, our formula is free from harsh chemicals, artificial fragrances, and dyes, making it a safe and effective solution for your body skincare needs.

Try White Sands: Dual-Action Body Scrub today and say goodbye to rough, bumpy skin and ingrown hairs. Your skin will thank you!
